font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: You can export your drawing in various file formats. This allows you to integrate your drawings into other programs or publish them on the network. You can choose between 5 different file formats:

text.style: font-family:'Arial Unicode MS'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;
font-family:'Arial Unicode MS'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;
font-family:'Arial Unicode MS'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;

font-family:'Arial Unicode MS'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: files are pixel format files. The conversion of a vector graphic (sPlan itself works with vector graphics) into a pixel format is always lossy. With the setting of a high resolution, however, you can minimize these losses here. However, this is then at the expense of the file size.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: As a rule, the JPG format is preferable to the BMP format, as it creates much smaller files with the same resolution.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: files are vector format files. Since sPlan also works in vector format, a loss-free export is theoretically possible. The EMF format is a Windows-specific vector format that can be read by many other graphics programs. Unfortunately, there are often compatibility problems here, so that the result is not always satisfactory. We recommend avoiding this format. It is actually only available in sPlan for reasons of compatibility.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: format is also a vector format. SVG stands for

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: raphics. SVG files can now be used directly by many browsers (Firefox, etc.) and other programs, and should definitely be preferred to the EMF format.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: To export the drawing, select the

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: menu. The following dialog then appears:

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Here you enter the desired file type of the target file.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: When exporting to a JPG or BMP file, it is necessary to specify the resolution of the pixel graphic to be created.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Use the slider to set the desired resolution. Please note that the file size of the target file increases with increasing resolution.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: This information is only necessary for the BMP export. The other file formats are generally colored.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: If possible, please select the "S / W" option here. Only if you absolutely need a colored drawing, please select the "Color" option. The reason for this is simple: a colored bitmap requires approximately 24 times as much memory as a monochrome bitmap. The same bitmap occupies, for example, 500 Kbytes of memory in b / w, as a colored bitmap, a full 12 Mbytes of memory. Even if you have drawn the drawing in color, you can create a b / w bitmap if it is enough for you. The individual colors are reproduced using a grid.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: You can see the required memory value for the bitmap online in the window.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Creates a graphic with a transparent background

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Here you specify what you want to export:

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: The entire page is exported in full size with all elements.

para.text: Everything is also exported, the page size is determined by a comprehensive rectangle over all elements.

para.text: Only the selected elements are exported.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:24px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: All pages of the project will be exported. Each page is exported to a separate file.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:24px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: The files are each appended with the page number, so several files are automatically created, such as:

para.text: After you have made and confirmed the desired settings, a "Save As" dialog appears in which you can specify the target folder and the file name. The file is then generated and saved.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
